description: Returns a set of temporary security credentials (consisting of an access key ID, a secret access key, and a security token) for a user.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: The temporary credentials provided by GetFederationToken can serve as alternate authentication tokens, enabling access to various AWS services without relying on long-term credentials, thereby aiding in defense evasion.
An attacker with access to the credentials of an IAM user could exploit GetFederationToken to generate new credentials, which can be used to escalate their privileges or access other resources.
Similar to manipulating access tokens, attackers can use GetFederationToken to create temporary sessions that spoof legitimate access patterns, aiding in evasion and unauthorized access.
